messages.content:
```md
Current initiative: 19 (round 2)
================================
# 19: Poe Beep <123/123 HP, 2 temp> (AC 18, Aid [8.0 hours], Rage [9.9 minutes], Blessed [10 rounds], Reckless [until start of next turn])
  14: Haldaal Idani <55/55 HP> (AC 15, Aid [8.0 hours], Blessed [10 rounds])
   5: GH1 <Dead> 
   5: Deathknight
     - Domnius <95/95 HP> (AC 20, Aid [8.0 hours], Bless [10 rounds], Blessed [10 rounds])
     - Umbra <35/35 HP> (AC 17, Saddle of the Cavalier, Aura of Protection)``` ```-----COMBAT ENDED-----```

Everyone roll for initiative!
If you have a character set up with SheetManager: `!init join`
If it's a 5e monster: `!init madd <monster name>`
Otherwise: `!init add <modifier> <name>`
Messages sent in this channel during combat will be recorded for research purposes. By sending messages in this channel during this combat, you agree to participate in the Avrae NLP study. See `!init nlp` for more information.

Haldaal Idani makes an Initiative check!
Domnius makes an Initiative check!

messages.content: Umbra was added to combat with initiative 5 as part of group Deathknight.

fields.name: Umbra
fields.value: Added effect Saddle of the Cavalier to Umbra.

embeds.title: Domnius spreads their Aura of Protection!

fields.name: Umbra
fields.value: **Effect**: Aura of Protection (Save Bonus: 4; Leave Aura of Protection)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
Whenever you or a friendly creature within 10 feet of you must make a saving throw, the creature gains a bonus to the saving throw equal to your Charisma modifier (with a minimum bonus of +1). You must be conscious to grant this bonus.

At 18th level, the range of this aura increases to 30 feet.

messages.content: GH1 was added to combat with initiative 1d20 (4) + 1 = `5`.

embeds.title: Haldaal Idani casts Aid!

Poe Beep: <123/123 HP, 6 temp> (10 overflow)
Haldaal Idani: <55/55 HP> (10 overflow)

**Effect**: Aid [8.0 hours] (Max HP Bonus: 10)
**Healing**: -10 [magical heal] = `-10`

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target’s Hit Point maximum and current Hit Points increase by 5 for the duration. Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. Each target's Hit Points increase by 5 for each spell slot level above 2.

fields.name: At Higher Levels
fields.value: Each target's Hit Points increase by 5 for each spell slot level above 2.

messages.content:
**Initiative 19 (round 1)**: Poe Beep (@Poe [10] || sophie🎀)
```md
Poe Beep <123/123 HP, 6 temp> (AC 18) 
> Immunities: critical hits
* Aid [8.0 hours] (Max HP Bonus: 10)```

fields.name: Poe Beep
fields.value: Added effect Reckless to Poe Beep.

embeds.title: Poe Beep attacks with a Velvet Slash!

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

fields.name: Heavy Weapon Mastery
fields.value: When you hit a creature with a weapon that has the Heavy property as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can cause the weapon to deal extra damage to the target. The extra damage equals your Proficiency Bonus.

fields.name: Butcher’s Bid
fields.value:
Once per turn when you roll damage for a melee attack with a weapon, you can reroll the weapon’s damage dice. If you do so, you must use the second total.
Your weapon attacks that deal slashing damage score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

messages.content:
**Initiative 14 (round 1)**: Haldaal Idani (@Haldaal [7] || S.J the 2nd)
```md
Haldaal Idani <55/55 HP> (AC 15) 
> Immunities: magical sleep
* Aid [8.0 hours] (Max HP Bonus: 10)```

embeds.title: Haldaal Idani casts Misty Step!

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

embeds.title: Haldaal Idani casts Toll the Dead!

fields.name: GH1
fields.value:
**WIS Save**: 1d20 (10) + 2 = `12`; Failure!
**Damage**: 2d12 (8, 6) [magical necrotic] = `14`

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: You point at one creature you can see within range, and the single chime of a dolorous bell is audible within 10 feet of the target. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d8 Necrotic damage. If the target is missing any of its Hit Points, it instead takes 1d12 Necrotic damage.

fields.name: **Cantrip Upgrade**
fields.value: The damage increases by one die when you reach levels 5 (2d8 or 2d12), 11 (3d8 or 3d12), and 17 (4d8 or 4d12).

embeds.title: GH1 attacks with Claws!

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

embeds.title: Poe Beep uses Rage (Enter)!

fields.name: Poe Beep
fields.value: **Effect**: Rage [10.0 minutes] (Check Advantage: Strength; Resistance: piercing, slashing, bludgeoning; Damage Bonus: 3; Save Advantage: Strength; End Rage)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You can imbue yourself with a primal power called Rage, a force that grants you extraordinary might and resilience. You can enter it as a Bonus Action if you aren’t wearing Heavy armor.  Whilst raging, you have the following benefits:
 - You are resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
 - When you make an attack using Strength and deal damage, you deal an additional 3 damage.

messages.content:
**Initiative 5 (round 1)**: Deathknight (@Arnulf  [5] || CarFax)
```md
Domnius <95/95 HP> (AC 20) 
> Resistances: radiant, necrotic
> Immunities: critical hits
* Aid [8.0 hours] (Max HP Bonus: 10)
Umbra <35/35 HP> (AC 17) 
* Saddle of the Cavalier  
 - All attacks against Umbra are made at disadvantage.
* Aura of Protection (Save Bonus: 4; Leave Aura of Protection) 
 - As long as you stay within 10 feet of Domnius, and they remain conscious```

embeds.title: Domnius casts Bless!

fields.name: Poe Beep
fields.value: **Effect**: Blessed [10 rounds] (Save Bonus: 1d4 [bless]; Attack Bonus: 1d4 [bless]; Parent: Bless)

fields.name: Haldaal Idani
fields.value: **Effect**: Blessed [10 rounds] (Save Bonus: 1d4 [bless]; Attack Bonus: 1d4 [bless]; Parent: Bless)

fields.name: Domnius
fields.value: **Effect**: Blessed [10 rounds] (Save Bonus: 1d4 [bless]; Attack Bonus: 1d4 [bless]; Parent: Bless)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: You bless up to three creatures within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target adds 1d4 to the attack roll or save.

messages.content:
**Initiative 19 (round 2)**: Poe Beep (@Poe [10] || sophie🎀)
```md
Poe Beep <123/123 HP, 2 temp> (AC 18) 
> Resistances: piercing, slashing, bludgeoning
> Immunities: critical hits
* Aid [8.0 hours] (Max HP Bonus: 10)
* Rage [9.9 minutes] (Check Advantage: Strength; Resistance: piercing, slashing, bludgeoning; Damage Bonus: 3; Save Advantage: Strength; End Rage) 
 - Cannot cast/concentrate on spells
 - Ends if knocked unconscious or if your turn ends and you haven't attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since your last turn
* Blessed [10 rounds] (Save Bonus: 1d4 [bless]; Attack Bonus: 1d4 [bless]; Parent: Bless)```

fields.name: Hamstring Blow
fields.value: The target’s Speed is reduced by 15 feet until the start of your next turn. A target can be affected by only one Hamstring Blow at a time—the most recent one.
